message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you is $800000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking for a better deal. Considering the product's value to me is $1200000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer it to you for $1050000. This is the best I can do, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1000000 for the product.

I understand that you're getting close to your budget, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell at $1000000. Considering the product's value to me is $1200000, I'll make a new offer. I'll meet you at $1020000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1010000 for the product.

I'm not willing to budge much more, Bob. Considering the product's value to me is $1200000, I'll make a new offer. I'll meet you at $1015000. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1012500 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. Considering the product's value to me is $1200000, I'll make a final offer. I'll meet you at $1012000. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1011250 for the product.
